data.feedback: All 9 user-requested epics are fully covered with comprehensive stories. Backend files verified to exist. Flutter data models correctly mirror backend schemas. WebSocket event handling aligns with backend handlers. Only minor issue is missing android/ios folders which can be generated via 'flutter create .' before execution.
issues: android/ and ios/ directories don't exist - need 'flutter create .' before platform config epics
suggestions: Add a story in epic-flutter-foundation to run 'flutter create .' to generate platform folders
